metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1000018 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
rssh version 2.3.4 contains a CWE-77: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in allowscp permission that can result in Local command execution. This attack appear to be exploitable via An authorized SSH user with the allowscp permission.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-1000018` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

rssh - 2.3.4-4+deb8u2build0.16.04.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> this fix introduced a regression, see debian bug

criterions.comment: rssh package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.4-4+deb8u2build0.16.04.2').
